title: My journey
creator_credit: Michelle Johnstone, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Dad taught me about photography, cooking, Geelong Football Club and Legacy. Michelle tells of how she joined as a junior legatee and how being a member of legacy has given her the confidence in life and has helped her to become who she is today.
